tool_description: Resolves IP addresses and domains to geographic locations and provides infrastructure attribution for threat intelligence analysis.

domains.description: Domain names to resolve for geolocation

usage: Provide IP addresses and optionally domain names to get geographic location and infrastructure details.

location_data.description: Geographic location data for each IP/domain

country_codes.description: ISO country codes for resolved locations

isp_information.description: Internet Service Provider information for each IP

infrastructure_type.description: Type of infrastructure (hosting, residential, mobile, etc.)
